author: Kelley Beaucar Vlahos
title: When it Comes to the VA, Do Veterans Really Have a ‘Choice’?
description: Add coronavirus to this raging private vs. public debate and what you get is a lot of individuals with nowhere to go. The post When it Comes to the VA, Do Veterans Really Have a ‘Choice’? appeared first on The American Conservative.
